Package com.freebase.happy

Class Summary
HappyBase Base class for happy jobs.
HappyBase.RecordIterator A Python iterator for map records.
HappyBase.ReduceIterator A python iterator for combiners and reducers.
HappyCombine Empty subclass that indicates that this is a combiner instead of a reducer.
HappyJobRunner The job runner and interactive console.
HappyLogger Simple wrapper around Hadoops Apache logging / Log4J log infrastructure.
HappyMap Happy Mapper.
HappyReduce Happy Reducer
JobWrapper A wrapper for the current JobConf in a job.
TaskWrapper A wrapper for the output collector.
